description: wooden brown dog house with red roof; arching cat standing on chimney, white and black spotted dog stands in front of house; coin slot covered by dog's head; depressing the cat makes the dog's head move downward exposing slot--release and cat and dog return to original position with a squeaking noise
inscription:
Inscriptions

under foot, black stamp: [JAPAN / SLIDE TO OPEN / (arrow to right)]; under foot, in black ink: [I\'m from Penra.]
title: "Dog and Cat" mechanical bank
